properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v13 v14 v15

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing a new song, a song of praise to God above
Sing a new song because of His amazing love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise Him with song O make joyful sound
Sing to the Lord! And let your praise abound!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, let us sing a song praise
Sing a new song a song of worship to the Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sing a new song for He is honored and adored
Worship the Lord Who is the Righteous King!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Worthy is He! Lift up your voice and sing!
Come, let us sing

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come, let us sing a song of praise
God of grace and glory of majesty and power

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Rock of all the ages, a strong and mighty tower
We will praise His faithfulness

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Worship Him in holiness
Come let us sing, Come let us sing a song of praise, of praise

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Girls: Sing a new song a song of everlasting joy
Boys: Sing a new song, a song of everlasting joy

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Girls: Sing a new song, a song that time cannot destroy
Boys: Sing a new song, a song that time cannot destroy

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Glory to God! Praise Him with harp and string
Mountains rejoice and all the valleys ring!

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Come let us sing, Come, let us sing a song of praise

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Come, let us sing, Come, let us sing

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Come, let us sing, Come, let us sing a song of praise
